/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with power lines and telephone poles, a common sight in many urban areas. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the bustling life that thrives beyond the frame of the image. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. In the distance, trees can be seen, their green foliage providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape.
